application.doc: Creating a Client Cert CDAS file

method.name: POST
method.id: Create a Client Cert CDAS file
method.doc: To create a Client Cert CDAS file with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP POST command on the Client Cert CDAS file resource URI. You can complete this operation by using a template or plain text.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: name
param.doc: The name of the new Client Cert CDAS file. If only the name is posted, the request is using the template. If content is also posted, it's using plain text which will become the new client cert cdas file contents.

param.name: content
param.doc: The content of the new Client Cert CDAS file as plain text. If not specified, the new file is created from the template file.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
